channel.title: Sophie's World
channel.description:
Anyone read this book? I decided that I needed a book to read while on holiday so I got my friend from philosophy class to find me something good to do with philosophy (As I never read so I have no idea what book would be good). He gave me sophie's world.
Was a pretty epic book, explained the entire history of philosophy, a long with a very strange and gripping story line.
Anyone else read this?
I highly recommend this to anyone who is interested in philosophy.
